definition: to soak in a special solution to soften and remove chemicals used in previous treatments
details:
verb
- to soak in a special solution to soften and remove chemicals used in previous treatments
= example: to soak in a special solution to soften and remove chemicals used in previous treatments
- to flap the wings wildly or frantically, of falcons
= example: to flap the wings wildly or frantically, of falcons
- to moderate or restrain
= example: to moderate or restrain
